title: Crusader Kings II 1.111 FULL [30 DLC]
description:
Crusader Kings II 1.111 FULL
It has all the DLC's

Installation:
1. Run Setup
2. Install
3. IMPORTANT: before you can play you need to run file inside installed folder of Crusader Kings II called "ck2_1_05g" THREE (3) TIME, yes THREE TIME. Game will crash everytime, nonetheless that was supposed to happen.
And then you start game normally!
No Crack nedded!

This version was downloaded from some Russian site, but everything is on english.
Sorry for rough instructions and my lousy english:)

Let's play!!!
